name: Revenge of Frazzle
description:
This game is a WIP remake of one my college assessments.

My first college assessment had the theme "Arcade Classics" where we had to make a game had to be based off of an arcade original from the 80's however, we had to include a modern twist to the game. My game of choice was Frogger, to make my version modernised, I decided to add a magical theme, collecting marbles to teleport to the next area closer to home.  The frog can cast ice and fire spells to assist them on their journey, blowing up their enemies or freezing the dangerous river so they can cross.

Controls:

Arrow Keys -> jump 1 unit in the given direction

C -> Shoot a powerful fireball to destroy enemies and burn flying arrows.

V -> Shoot a cold ice blast that can freeze enemies in their tracks and create an icy path in the river

ESC - Quit Game
